libOs

LibOs is the library that include all system api to create applications for this exokernel system. Api are splitted in 4 main modules:

  • KernelBinding: it provides some function to handle kernel functions to allocate and deallocate memory, create, kill and fork process, i/o with ports and other related things.
  • VirtualFileSystem: it provides functions to mount/umount/format a filesystem and functions to perform operation with nodes (open/write/read/etc).
  • Ui: it provides an object oriented framework to create graphics user interface in a simple way. The gui layout manager is based on the boxing system (like gtk), and the event-handling is made trought registered callbacks. There's a tiny set of widgets at the moment.
  • DeviceDriver: it provides a common interface for different drivers, and few functions to add/del drivers and probe devices from different types of bus (pci, usb, isa).
